name: Mastermind (itch) (kaakas, batmans_banana, fuann)
description:
You are the king of the darkness and now 3 heroes trying to kill you, defend yourself with your army!

In this little strategy game that was created for the 8th Bored Pixels Jam you play as the bad guy. 3 hero is on the way to kill you, but you have a big army, command them and defend your life.

Play it on full screen!

If you cant start the webplayer just download the file named Build.zip and there you have the game!

Controls

  • [Space] - Time stop/resume
  • [Tab] - Change camera perspective
  • [Shift] - Fast forward time
  • [Esc] - Open menu

Creators

  • https://itch.io/profile/fuann
  • https://itch.io/profile/batmans-banana
  • https://itch.io/profile/kaakas

Little bugs may occur, try to pause the game with ESC and resume it, sometimes it helps it!
